backend/main.mo: Actor that includes a blob storage mixin for simple storage behavior.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short summaries of their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark theme plus global resets.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Certif: Displays certifications and training cards plus an additional qualifications list.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Contac: Renders contact methods as interactive cards and a closing call‑to‑action block.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Educat: Shows education entries with degree, institution, dates, location, and optional details.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Experi: Lists professional experience cards with role details and bullet achievements.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Footer: Footer with attribution, copyright, and conditional social media links.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/HeroSe: Hero banner with badges, name, title, summary, and CTAs including resume download.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Highli: Renders a grid of highlight cards with icons, values, and descriptions for portfolio stats.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Langua: Displays language proficiencies using cards, badges, and color indicators based on resumeContent.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Shows project cards with descriptions, bullets, tech badges, and optional GitHub or external links.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Resume: Provides a resume download button that checks asset availability before enabling the download.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Sectio: Reusable layout wrapper for portfolio sections with title and styled container.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Skills: Lists skill categories from resumeContent in cards with badges and a brief summary area.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/TopNav: Implements a responsive top navigation bar with smooth-scrolling links and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/content/resumeContent.ts: Exports strongly typed resume data including experience, projects, skills, education, and contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
Checks via HEAD request whether a given asset exists and returns availability state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the portfolio.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Composes the full portfolio page by rendering navigation, multiple content sections, and a footer.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins using OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including feature requests, versions, and current project summary.
